name: IceCreamPronto
0:
”Alexa, open Ice Cream Pronto”
”Request the Ice Cream Truck”
”Tell the Ice Cream Truck to stop by”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: ice cream pronto
Developer Terms of Use
des: Have you ever missed the Ice Cream Truck as it passed by your house? No more! With Ice Cream Pronto, Alexa will notify you when the truck is near. You can also request to be added to their route or notify the truck while in route.
